Careers.openidJquery=function(){return{init:function(){var a={stack_exchange:{name:"Stack_Exchange",url:"https://openid.stackexchange.com/",x:-1,y:-518},google:{name:"Google",url:"https://www.google.com/accounts/o8/id",x:-1,y:-1},facebook:{name:"Facebook",oauth_version:"2.0",oauth_server:"https://graph.facebook.com/oauth/authorize",x:-1,y:-456},yahoo:{name:"Yahoo",url:"http://yahoo.com/",x:-1,y:-63}},b={myopenid:{name:"MyOpenID",url:"http://myopenid.com/",x:-27,y:-326},livejournal:{name:"LiveJournal",label:Careers._s("Enter your Livejournal username"),url:"http://{username}.livejournal.com/",x:-1,y:-352},wordpress:{name:"Wordpress",label:Careers._s("Enter your Wordpress.com username"),url:"http://{username}.wordpress.com/",x:-1,y:-404},blogger:{name:"Blogger",label:Careers._s("Enter your Blogger account"),url:"http://{username}.blogspot.com/",x:-1,y:-249},verisign:{name:"Verisign",label:Careers._s("Enter your Verisign username"),url:"http://{username}.pip.verisignlabs.com/",x:-1,y:-378},claimid:{name:"ClaimID",label:Careers._s("Enter your ClaimID username"),url:"http://openid.claimid.com/{username}",x:-1,y:-326},clickpass:{name:"ClickPass",label:Careers._s("Enter your ClickPass username"),url:"http://clickpass.com/public/{username}",x:-1,y:-274},google_profile:{name:"Google_Profile",label:Careers._s("Enter your Google Profile username"),url:"http://www.google.com/profiles/{username}",x:-1,y:-300},aol:{name:"AOL",label:Careers._s("Enter your AOL screenname"),url:"http://openid.aol.com/{username}",x:-27,y:-249}},c=$.extend({},a,b),d={cookie_expires:180,cookie_name:"openid_provider",cookie_path:"/",input_id:null,provider_url:null,init:function(c){$("body").css("cursor","default"),$("#openid_submit").css("cursor","default"),$("input[type=submit]").removeAttr("disabled");var d=$("#openid_btns_large"),e=$("#openid_btns_small");this.input_id=c,$("#openid_choice").show(),$("#openid_input_area").empty();for(id in a)d.append(this.getBoxHTML(a[id],"large"));if(b){d.append("<br />");for(id in b)e.append(this.getBoxHTML(b[id],"small"))}$("#openid_form").submit(this.submitx)},getBoxHTML:function(a,b){var c=a.name.toLowerCase(),e=$("<a />");return e.attr("title",Careers._s("Log in using $providerName$",{providerName:a.name.replace("_"," ")})).attr("style","background-position: "+a.x+"px "+a.y+"px").attr("box_id",c).addClass(c).addClass("openid_"+b+"_btn").click(function(){d.signin($(this).attr("box_id"))}).mousedown(function(){$(this).addClass("depress")}).mouseup(function(){$(this).removeClass("depress")}).mouseout(function(){$(this).removeClass("depress")}),e},signin:function(a,b){var d=c[a];if(!d)return;this.highlight(a);if(a=="openid"){$("#openid_input_area").empty(),this.setOpenIdUrl(""),$("#openid_identifier").focus();return}d.label?(this.useInputBox(d),this.provider_url=d.url):($("."+a).css("cursor","wait"),d.oauth_version?this.setOAuthInfo(d.oauth_version,d.oauth_server):this.setOpenIdUrl(d.url),this.provider_url=null,b||$("#openid_form").submit())},submitx:function(){if($("#openid_username").val()=="")return!0;$("body").css("cursor","wait"),$("#openid_submit").css("cursor","wait"),$("input[type=submit]",this).attr("disabled","disabled");var a=d.provider_url;return a&&(a=a.replace("{username}",$("#openid_username").val()),d.setOpenIdUrl(a)),!0},setOpenIdUrl:function(a){var b=$("#"+this.input_id);b.val(a),$("#oauth_version").val(""),$("#oauth_server").val("")},setOAuthInfo:function(a,b){var c=$("#oauth_version");c.val(a);var d=$("#oauth_server");d.val(b),$("#"+this.input_id).val("")},highlight:function(a){$(".openid_large_btn, .openid_small_btn").removeClass("highlight"),$("."+a).addClass("highlight")},useInputBox:function(a){var b=$("#openid_input_area"),c="",d="openid_username",e="",g=a.label,i="";g&&(c="<label>"+g+"</label>"),c+='<input id="'+d+'" type="text" style="'+i+'" name="'+d+'" value="'+e+'" />'+' <input id="openid_submit" type="submit" value="'+Careers._s("Sign In")+'" />',b.empty(),b.append(c),b.show(),f.show(),h(),$("#"+d).focus()}},e,f,g,h=function(){g.html(g.html().replace("More","Fewer")),$.cookie(e,"1",{expires:90})},i=function(){g.html(g.html().replace("Fewer","More")),$.cookie(e,null)};e="openid_more",f=$("div#openid_more"),g=$("a#openid_more_link"),d.init("openid_identifier"),$.cookie(e)&&(f.show(),h()),g.click(function(){f.slideToggle("fast",function(){f.is(":visible")?h():i()})})}}}()
